files.patch: @@ -1954,1 +1954,1 @@ - * be used to find this node as follows: scene.lookup("#myId");. + * be used to find this node as follows: {@code scene.lookup("#myId");}. @@ -1959,1 +1959,2 @@ - * scene.lookup(".myStyle:myPseudo"); or scene.lookup(":myPseudo"); + * {@code scene.lookup(".myStyle:myPseudo");} or {@code scene.lookup(":myPseudo");}. If no pseudo class is specified + * by the lookup selector, irrespective of the nodes pseudo states the result will contain the first node matching the selector. @@ -1978,1 +1979,1 @@ - * be used to find all these nodes as follows: scene.lookupAll(".myStyle");. + * be used to find all these nodes as follows: {@code scene.lookupAll(".myStyle");}. @@ -1983,1 +1984,2 @@ - * scene.lookupAll(".myStyle:myPseudo"); or scene.lookupAll(":myPseudo"); + * {@code scene.lookupAll(".myStyle:myPseudo");} or {@code scene.lookupAll(":myPseudo");}. If no pseudo class is specified + * by the lookupAll selector, irrespective of their pseudo states the result will contain all nodes matching the selector. @@ -2003,2 +2005,2 @@ - * @param selector The Selector. - * @param results The results. + * @param selector The css selector of the nodes to find + * @param results The results
